kchandra423.levels

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • kchandra423.levels.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A room contains all the enemies and obstacles and boundaries that a player is currently in
    Author:
    Kumar Chandra
    See Also:
    Actor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Currently just creates a room with some random default enemies and obstacles
      Room(Texture background, java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles, java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies, Player p, java.awt.Rectangle bounds)
      Constructs a room with the given values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room()
        Currently just creates a room with some random default enemies and obstacles

      • Room

        public Room(Texture background,
            java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles,
            java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
            Player p,
            java.awt.Rectangle bounds)
        Constructs a room with the given values
        Parameters:
        background - The background of this room
        obstacles - The obstacles in this room
        enemies - The enemies in this room
        p - The Player in this room
        bounds - The boundaries of this room

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(DrawingSurface d)
        Draws everything in this room onto the given drawing surface. Also cause the act method of all actors
        Parameters:
        d - The drawing surface that actors will be drawn onto

      • inBounds

        public boolean inBounds(KImage shape)
        Returns whether or not a KImage is within the boundaries of this room. Somewhat expensive call, although not as much as intersection
        Parameters:
        shape - The Kimage which will have its boundaries checked
        Returns:
        Returns false if the KImage is not within the bounds of this room, using the rectangles class' definition of insides. Returns true otherwise

      • inBounds

        public boolean inBounds(float x,
                        float y)
        Returns whether or not a point is within the boundaries of this room Inexpensive call
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of the point
        y - The y value of the point
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the x,y point is within the bounds of this room using the rectangle class' definition of insideness

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns the player for this room
        Returns:
        this room's player

      • getEnemies

        public java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getEnemies()
        Returns all the enemies within this room
        Returns:
        All enemies contained by this room

      • getObstacles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacles()
        Returns all obstacles within this room
        Returns:
        All obstaacles contained in the room

      • getClosestEnemy

        public Enemy getClosestEnemy(float x,
                             float y)
        Returns the closest enemy from a given point
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the given point
        y - The y coordinate of the given point
        Returns:
        The closest enemy from the given point

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Returns whether this room is completed. This occurs when all enemies are dead and the player is standing on the portal
        Returns:
        True if all enemies are dead and the player is standing on the portal. Returns false otherwise.
